title: The Epistles and Gospelles with a brief postil vpon the same from after Easter tyll Aduent, which is the somer parte set forth for the singuler co[m]moditie of all good Christen men and namely of prestes and curates.
author: Taverner, Richard, 1505?-1575.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Richarde Bankes, and are to be solde in Fletestrete at the sygne of the Whyte Harte,
